SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.model

Class EventDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.model.EventDatabase
public class EventDatabase extends Object
Provides an interface for interacting with the Firestore database containing Event objects.

This class is primarily for handling basic CRUD operations such as retrieving, inserting, and updating events, as well as fetching all events created by a particular organizer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventDatabase()
    Default constructor initializes the Firestore instance and sets the reference to the "event" collection.

      public void insert(Event event)

      Parameters:

    • organizerGetEvents

      public void organizerGetEvents(Organizer organizer, ArrayList<Event> data, EventAdapter adapter)
      Retrieves all events associated with a particular organizer.

      Each event is added to the provided data list, and the adapter is notified to refresh the UI.

      Parameters:
      organizer - the Organizer whose events are to be retrieved
      data - the ArrayList to store the retrieved events
      adapter - the EventAdapter to notify when data changes

    • organizerUpdateEvent

      public void organizerUpdateEvent(Event event)
      Updates the event in firestore, according to what an organizer changes. TODO: Right now it just updates the waitlistMax invalid input: '&' start + end date.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to update.
